title: Leaverbuster for client not working
body: My client told me to reconnect so i tried exited the client and the game and it wouldn't let sign in.

replies.body: Since there are a decent number of players having this issue, I'd like to see how we can help out. It would be a lot better to do so one on one though, so reach out to our agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and that way we can look into what happened in your case ^_^!
